name: castopod
tagline: A self-hosted podcast platform with publishing, analytics, and federation support
description: Castopod is a self-hosted podcast hosting platform built to support social interaction and sharing. It supports multiple users, analytics, episode scheduling, and federated distribution with ActivityPub.

features.title: Podcast Hosting
features.description: Complete platform for hosting and distributing podcasts. Professional solution

features.title: Activitypub Federation
features.description: Connect with the fediverse for social distribution. Decentralized reach

features.title: Episode Scheduling
features.description: Plan and automate episode releases. Consistent publishing

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track listener statistics and engagement. Understand your audience

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Team collaboration with role-based permissions. Shared management

features.title: Rss Feeds
features.description: Standard podcast RSS for all directories. Universal compatibility

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Own your podcast platform and data. Complete independence
